name: GameEXE
description:
Video:

This software was made in Visual Studio 2010

Language: English (Spanish version soon)

Welcome to GameExE! a puzzle game for people who like challenges.. It is made in visual 2010.

How to play?
Solve 10 puzzles to win, each puzzle is more difficult than the previous one!
IMPORTANT: NET Framework 3.5 is required.
Thanks guys and i hope you have fun :)
